1.Title: Thick Broth
1.Description: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>2%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

2.Description: For every 10 Energy accumulated, the equipper's Impact is increased by <color=#2BAD00>2.3%</color>, stacking up to 8 times. After Energy is consumed, this bonus remains for 8 more seconds. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
